name: io.github.alondmnt/joplin-mcp
description: FastMCP server exposing Joplin notes, notebooks, tags, and imports.

environmentVariables.description: Web Clipper authentication token from a running Joplin instance
environmentVariables.name: JOPLIN_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Optional override for the Joplin Web Clipper base URL (default http://localhost:41184)
environmentVariables.name: JOPLIN_URL
